price: Dijo [Abraham]: "Emigraré a donde mi Señor me ordene. ¡Él me guiará!
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
